answerText: Candide[10] In Candide, the optimistic Dr. Pangloss serves as a parody of this German philosopher, whose Monadology includes the statement, "Therefore this is the best of all possible worlds."
heading: Collegiate Novice |2012 | 7 | 14 | Literature | European | College
subject: Literature
question: Question: The title character of this novel loves Cunegonde.  [10] Name this French satirical novel about a character who is taught by Dr. Pangloss.
